title: Menko PMK: Penanganan Bencana di Aceh, Sumut, dan Sumbar Tunjukkan Kemajuan Signifikan
title_en: Coordinating Minister for Human Development and Culture: Disaster Handling in Aceh, North Sumatra, and West Sumatra Shows Significant Progress
content:
Menko PMK menyatakan kemajuan signifikan dalam tanggap darurat, rehabilitasi, dan rekonstruksi pascabencana banjir dan longsor di Aceh, Sumut, dan Sumbar, yang ditetapkan sebagai prioritas nasional.

Konektivitas jalan provinsi/nasional sebagian besar pulih, layanan listrik, komunikasi, air bersih, dan logistik stabil meski ada tantangan di wilayah terpencil. Pembangunan hunian sementara dan tetap dimulai dengan target selesai 1-2,5 bulan, melibatkan TNI, Polri, dan kementerian terkait.
content_en:
Coordinating Minister PMK announced substantial advances in emergency response, rehabilitation, and reconstruction after floods and landslides in Aceh, North Sumatra, and West Sumatra, designated as a national priority.

Most provincial/national roads are reconnected, with basic services like electricity, communication, clean water, and logistics largely restored despite remote area challenges. Temporary and permanent housing construction has begun, targeting completion in 1-2.5 months via TNI, Police, and ministries.
